beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Here's where Gravel Roubaix breaks you. 100 mi. Zone by zone.
beats.visual: Full route map, then zoom into first zone
beats.editing_note: Start with full route visible, then rapid zoom in. Ominous music hit. Avatar suffering face.

beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 2
beats.narration: Mile 2. The Three Sisters. Three punchy gravel climbs right after the pavement start, averaging 3.5% but spiking to 15%.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Pocono Mountain gravel roads - steep sustained climbs, technical rocky descents, remote forest roads

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 1 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 25
beats.narration: Mile 25. The Wall. Quarter-mile of 12% grade that fake-crests twice. When you think you're done climbing, a sharp left turn reveals.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Pocono Mountain gravel roads - steep sustained climbs, technical rocky descents, remote forest roads

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 2 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 40
beats.narration: Mile 40. Sager Road. A mile of unmaintained two-track that's either sandy hell, rocky chaos, or muddy bike-destroyer depending on weather.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Pocono Mountain gravel roads - steep sustained climbs, technical rocky descents, remote forest roads

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 3 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 4: Mile 75
beats.narration: Mile 75. The Reckoning. Your legs are cooked and there's still 25 miles left. The gravel stops feeling firm and starts feeling.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Pocono Mountain gravel roads - steep sustained climbs, technical rocky descents, remote forest roads

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 4 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).
